title: vertoreum
author: vertoreum
created_time: September 29, 2022, 07:25:14 PMLast edit: September 29, 2022, 09:38:46 PM by vertoreum
content: Vertoreum (VTRM) - A Rare Proof of Work CoinTheoretically investing in Vertoreum is twice as good than investing in Bitcoin. This is based off the fact that the reward halves about every year, and that there is only 10.5 million coins.Why choose Vertoreum?Vertoreum has many things in place that make it more valuable. It has half as many coins as Bitcoin (10,500,000 coins) which allows for more rarity and price fluctuations. Vertoreum is only mineable with CPUs and GPUs and is protected against 51% attacks. Vertoreum transactions are twice as fast as Bitcoin.Download the Wallet: https://github.com/vertoreum/vertoreum/releases/latestSpecifications• Name: Vertoreum• Ticker: VTRM• ASICS resistant• Protected against double spend and 51% attacks• Adopts Segwit transactions• Algorithm: YescryptR16• Block Time: 5 minutes• Block Reward: 50 VTRM• Difficulty: Every block with Vertoreum difficulty calculation• Halving: 105,000 blocks (1 year)• P2P Port: 16178• RPC Port: 16179• Max supply: 10,500,000 VTRM• POW Lifespan: 3,360,000 blocks - 32 years• Confirmations: 100• Premined: None• Chain type: POW• Website: https://vertoreum.org• Discord: https://discord.gg/r9SmgeQCtM• Twitter: https://twitter.com/vertoreum• Reddit: https://reddit.com/user/vertoreum• Instagram: https://instagram.com/vertoreumThanks BitcoinTalk, and have a great day!

comments.author: coin790
comments.body: any idea how to start mining? I have tried from the mining software and from command none works I receive this errorJSON value is not an integer as expected (code -1)

comments.author: Bacardi Toni
comments.body: Example to mine local with batch file with cpuminer-opt "cpuminer-sse2.exe -a yescryptr16 -o http://127.0.0.1:16179/ -u username -p password --coinbase-addr=vJLxPg8WZvs2Z6LHsWTryUe8Q7VB3vuTGB"you must only change your wallet address.Read more at Discord

comments.author: wreckless_
comments.body: New Pool Up/Running - https://cpumining.club - Shared/Solo Pool-a yescryptR16 -o stratum+tcp://cpumining.club:8900 -u address.rigID -p c=VTRM         - Shared CMD String-a yescryptR16 -o stratum+tcp://cpumining.club:8900 -u address.rigID -p c=VTRM,m=solo       - Solo CMD string

comments.author: MiningCoinsPool
comments.body: CPUMINING POOL     +     Vertoreum(VTRM)    Shared Code:-a yescryptr16 -o stratum+tcp://cpumining.club:8900 -u <wallet_address> -p c=VTRMSolo Code:-a yescryptr16 -o stratum+tcp://cpumining.club:8900 -u <wallet_address> -p c=VTRM,m=solo

comments.author: TimeTeller
comments.body: While maybe it is true that theoretically investing on this coin is better than btc,but realistically speaking, people will still go to bitcoin for their investments. VTRM may have half of the supply of BTC, however, just look at how popular it is to the crypto market.Let alone think of the exchanges BTC is listed. And how about VTRM, where it is listed?@OP, what do you think will be the reason why people go to your coin and buy for long-term instead of BTC?

comments.author: Tarz
comments.body: Bitcoin veins are all clogged with dust transactions, impossible to maintain the same transaction throughput as last year which results in extended waiting time to get ur coins to confirmed status. On the rival side is a vertoreum, a toilet latrine coin with better options of making ur life easier when u send money online. Vertoreum is a piss blip schmuck of crypto but it gives a nice competition to bitcoin & co.
